RemoveXSS.php

00001 <?php
00023 class RemoveXSS {
00024 
00034         function RemoveXSS($val)        {
00035                 // remove all non-printable characters. CR(0a) and LF(0b) and TAB(9) are allowed
00036                 // this prevents some character re-spacing such as <java\0script>
00037                 // note that you have to handle splits with \n, \r, and \t later since they *are* allowed in some inputs
00038                 $val = preg_replace('/([\x00-\x08][\x0b-\x0c][\x0e-\x20])/', '', $val);
00039 
00040                 // straight replacements, the user should never need these since they're normal characters
00041                 // this prevents like <IMG SRC=&#X40&#X61&#X76&#X61&#X73&#X63&#X72&#X69&#X70&#X74&#X3A&#X61&#X6C&#X65&#X72&#X74&#X28&#X27&#X58&#X53&#X53&#X27&#X29>
00042                 $search = 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz';
00043                 $search.= 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ';
00044                 $search.= '1234567890!@#$%^&*()';
00045                 $search.= '~`";:?+/={}[]-_|\'\\';
00046 
00047                 for ($i = 0; $i < strlen($search); $i++) {
00048                         // ;? matches the ;, which is optional
00049                         // 0{0,7} matches any padded zeros, which are optional and go up to 8 chars
00050 
00051                         // &#x0040 @ search for the hex values
00052                         $val = preg_replace('/(&#[x|X]0{0,8}'.dechex(ord($search[$i])).';?)/i', $search[$i], $val); // with a ;
00053                         // &#00064 @ 0{0,7} matches '0' zero to seven times
00054                         $val = preg_replace('/(&#0{0,8}'.ord($search[$i]).';?)/', $search[$i], $val); // with a ;
00055                 }
00056 
00057                 // now the only remaining whitespace attacks are \t, \n, and \r
00058                 $ra1 = array('javascript', 'vbscript', 'expression', 'applet', 'meta', 'xml', 'blink', 'link', 'style', 'script', 'embed', 'object', 'iframe', 'frame', 'frameset', 'ilayer', 'layer', 'bgsound', 'title', 'base');
00059                 $ra2 = array('onabort', 'onactivate', 'onafterprint', 'onafterupdate', 'onbeforeactivate', 'onbeforecopy', 'onbeforecut', 'onbeforedeactivate', 'onbeforeeditfocus', 'onbeforepaste', 'onbeforeprint', 'onbeforeunload', 'onbeforeupdate', 'onblur', 'onbounce', 'oncellchange', 'onchange', 'onclick', 'oncontextmenu', 'oncontrolselect', 'oncopy', 'oncut', 'ondataavailable', 'ondatasetchanged', 'ondatasetcomplete', 'ondblclick', 'ondeactivate', 'ondrag', 'ondragend', 'ondragenter', 'ondragleave', 'ondragover', 'ondragstart', 'ondrop', 'onerror', 'onerrorupdate', 'onfilterchange', 'onfinish', 'onfocus', 'onfocusin', 'onfocusout', 'onhelp', 'onkeydown', 'onkeypress', 'onkeyup', 'onlayoutcomplete', 'onload', 'onlosecapture', 'onmousedown', 'onmouseenter', 'onmouseleave', 'onmousemove', 'onmouseout', 'onmouseover', 'onmouseup', 'onmousewheel', 'onmove', 'onmoveend', 'onmovestart', 'onpaste', 'onpropertychange', 'onreadystatechange', 'onreset', 'onresize', 'onresizeend', 'onresizestart', 'onrowenter', 'onrowexit', 'onrowsdelete', 'onrowsinserted', 'onscroll', 'onselect', 'onselectionchange', 'onselectstart', 'onstart', 'onstop', 'onsubmit', 'onunload');
00060                 $ra = array_merge($ra1, $ra2);
00061 
00062                 $found = true; // keep replacing as long as the previous round replaced something
00063                 while ($found == true) {
00064                         $val_before = $val;
00065                         for ($i = 0; $i < sizeof($ra); $i++) {
00066                                 $pattern = '/';
00067                                 for ($j = 0; $j < strlen($ra[$i]); $j++) {
00068                                         if ($j > 0) {
00069                                                 $pattern .= '(';
00070                                                 $pattern .= '(&#[x|X]0{0,8}([9][a][b]);?)?';
00071                                                 $pattern .= '|(&#0{0,8}([9][10][13]);?)?';
00072                                                 $pattern .= ')?';
00073                                         }
00074                                         $pattern .= $ra[$i][$j];
00075                                 }
00076                                 $pattern .= '/i';
00077                                 $replacement = substr($ra[$i], 0, 2).'<x>'.substr($ra[$i], 2); // add in <> to nerf the tag
00078                                 $val = preg_replace($pattern, $replacement, $val); // filter out the hex tags
00079                                 if ($val_before == $val) {
00080                                         // no replacements were made, so exit the loop
00081                                         $found = false;
00082                                 }
00083                         }
00084                 }
00085 
00086                 return $val;
00087         }
00088 }
00089 
00090 ?>
